Package zuul

Class Room

java.lang.Object
zuul.Room
public class Room extends Object
Class zuul.Room - a room in an adventure game.

This class is part of the "World of Zuul" application. "World of Zuul" is a very simple, text based adventure game.

A "zuul.Room" represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. The exits are stored with each Room as a key value pair. For each direction, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room, or null if there is no exit in that direction.

  • Constructor Details

    • Room

      public Room​(String description)
      Create a room described "description". Initially, it has no exits. "description" is something like "a kitchen" or "an open court yard". Initializes items and characters are empty for any room
      Parameters:
      description - The room's description.

  • Method Details

    • setExit

      public void setExit​(Direction direction, Room neighbor)
      Define the exits of this room. Every direction either leads to another room or is null (no exit there).
      Parameters:
      direction - specifies the direction as Direction Enum.
      neighbor - specifies the neighboring room
